name: bottelegram
description: 1. Open telegram and find chat BotFather and click start 2. write /newbot  3. write name : BlockChainsRandomize 4. write name bot : BlockChainsRandomizeBot 5. U get  HTTP API KEY 6. Download Python 7. Get Pip write on terminal : curl https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py -o get-pip.py  and python3 get-pip.py 6. go to https://docs.python-telegram-bot.org/ 7. find install instruction  8. write on console : pip install python-telegram-bot --upgrade
